author: Charles A. Lindbergh
message: Life a culmination of the past, an awareness of the present, an indication of the future beyond knowledge, the quality that gives a touch of divinity to matter.
title: Thought of the day

author: Robert Brault
message: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
title: Thought of the day

author: Oprah Winfrey
message: With every experience, you alone are painting your own canvas, thought by thought, choice by choice.
title: Thought of the day

author: Rumi
message: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
title: Thought of the day
